data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Smith, David R., Tripotin, Pierre (2012): Trigonalidae (Hymenoptera) of Madagascar. Journal of Hymenoptera Research 24: 1-25, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/JHR.24.1811, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/JHR.24.1811
